title: Web Connection Protocol 3 Handshake
description: Handshake message sent by the Desktop Agent to the app (with a MessagePort appended) that should be used for subsequent communication steps.

fdc3Version.title: FDC3 version
fdc3Version.description: The version of FDC3 API that the Desktop Agent will provide support for.

intentResolverUrl.title: Resolver URL
intentResolverUrl.description: Indicates whether an intent resolver user interface is required and the URL to use to do so. Set to `true` to use the default or `false` to disable the intent resolver (as the Desktop Agent will handle it another way).

channelSelectorUrl.title: Channel Selector URL
channelSelectorUrl.description: Indicates whether a channel selector user interface is required and the URL to use to do so. Set to `true` to use the default or `false` to disable the channel selector (as the Desktop Agent will handle it another way).

messageExchangeTimeout.title: Message Exchange Timeout
messageExchangeTimeout.description: Indicates a custom timeout (in milliseconds) that should be used for the majority of API message exchanges instead of the default 10,000 millisecond timeout.

appLaunchTimeout.title: App Launch Timeout
appLaunchTimeout.description: Indicates a custom timeout (in milliseconds) that should be used for API message exchanges that may involve launching an application, instead of the default 100,000 millisecond timeout.
